description: This comprehensive course is all about helping you land your dream job. In today's competitive workforce and struggling economy, people looking for job need a special edge to get ahead. The professionals at Michele Michael Associates Inc. offer easy, simple and memorable tips that you should apply when writing your resume and going on interviews. Employers are looking for candidates with these key qualities. With 5 quick video lessons and flow charts you can master the art of resume writing and going on an interview with any company in the nation.
title: The Professional Guide to Landing Your Dream Job
